General.Name: Western Exploration Inc
General.Description: Western Exploration Inc. engages in the exploration and development of gold and silver deposits in North America. Its principal asset is the Aura gold silver project comprising of 709 unpatented lode mining claims covering 12,848 acres located in Elko County, Nevada. The company is based in Reno, Nevada. Western Exploration Inc. operates as a subsidiary of Golkonda Llc.
General.Address: 121 Woodland Avenue, Reno, NV, United States, 89523
